verses.name: Numbers 11:19
verses.text: Ye shall not eat one day, nor two days, nor five days, neither ten days, nor twenty days;

verses.name: Numbers 11:20
verses.text: But even a whole month, until it come out at your nostrils, and it be loathsome unto you: because that ye have despised the Lord which is among you, and have wept before him, saying, Why came we forth out of Egypt?

verses.name: Numbers 11:21
verses.text: And Moses said, The people, among whom I am, are six hundred thousand footmen; and thou hast said, I will give them flesh, that they may eat a whole month.
